description: An introduction to the major themes and ideas of the Hebrew Bible (the Old Testament), with attention to the contributions of archaeology and modern Biblical scholarship, including Biblical criticism and the response to it in Judaism and Christianity. All readings are in English.
name: INTRO TO THE BIBLE

values.comments: Students were overall ebullient about Professor Tigay and his teaching style. Many superlatives were used to describe Tigay as “the best” and teaching “the most interesting course” at Penn. His availability outside class and willingness to entertain questions were applauded by students. While relatively few, complaints included a desire to have all notes posted to Blackboard and to have final grades curved.
